name: i guess it's the Calamity now?
name_original: i guess it's the Calamity now?
description:
A point and click game where the player finds different ways to spend their last moments before the Calamity strikes.

FEATURES:

  • Groundhog day-like gameplay
  • Five endings (one has to be unlocked!)
  • Lots of unfulfillment!
  • An unavoidable Calamity!
  • Probably a deeper meaning in here somewhere!
  • Will take about 5 minutes to play

Coded in p5.js for a class assignment.
